inclusion.criterion: Pregnancy with diagnosis of GDM, within the last 5 years
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Complete resolution of GDM after delivery
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Pregnancy without problems in glucose homeostasis, within the last 5 years
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Insulin secretion-sensitivity index-2 (ISSI-2) > 800 on oral glucose tolerance test
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous treatment (within 6 months) with synthetic exendin
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has pancreatic adenocarcinoma and a diverticular abscess, which may trigger exclusion criteria.
